content: For fiscal 2022, we expect ending Connected Fitness subscriptions of approximately three million implying 670,000 net ads and representing 29% year-over-year growth and a 66% 2-year CAGR for ending subs. For Q3, we expect ending Connected Fitness subscriptions of approximately 2.93 million, implying 160,000 net ads and representing 41% year-over-year growth and an 82% two-year CAGR for ending subs. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
